I've always known that you wanted to kill me, KSL. But I never knew you were 
so passionate about it. :)

* Iron Raptor was disappointed to see that Perndabot had sliced through her 
slashes, but there was plenty more where that came from!
With her feet pounding against the ground she neared her targits location, 
sword in hand and her muscles tightening for contact with his blade.
She wouldn't have known it if she had been any deeper in battle, but the 
same thing which had taken her over during the fight with Shadow was doing 
the exact same thing now. Only more slowly and cunning.
Ane even as it slowly creeped up on her, she already knew what ahs was going 
to do to get the upper hand on this.

In mid-stride Iron Raptor picked up her pace, her legs pumping against the 
armor and her feet against the ground, gaining speed.
The weakest part of an enemy...their eyes!
Iron Raptor's scanners suddenly detected another bot which was flying at 
her, opening fire and sending shots at her.
But she had this bot to deal with first.
Breathing lightly Iron Raptor suddenly brought herself to a skidding stop 
right in front of Perndabot, making sure that a whole lot of dirt and dust 
sprayed up as she slid onto her side.
Laying on her back for a moment as she shots fired at her from above 
exploded on the ground all around her while others went overhead.
But she growled and quickly got to her feet, jumping back from Perndabot and 
then looking up into the sky.
Where she saw Nemisis Enforcer, just in time to see that all of the shots he 
had fired at her had not all came to her location yet.

Iron Raptor growled as one of the shots mannaged to strike her in the 
shoulder-plate, making it swing back slightly while the shield expanded from 
her arm and she braced herself. The shield easily withstood the remainder of 
the charges as they struck her.
Then, peering over the top of the armor and sure that all which was coming 
towards her had gone, she retracted the shield and brough up a pair of guns 
wich folded in from behind her shoulders ( much like transmetal optimus 
primal's did.)
Iron Raptor quickly locked her fingers around the joysticks which were 
hidden behind plates of the same armor which her suit was made out of. The 
top braced and attached at her shoulders.
Planting her feet firmly against the ground  her index fingers pressed hard 
against the triggers on the sticks, sending a wave of shocking charges 
upwards towards Nemisis.
The kickback from the guns almost knocking her from her feet.

Her eyes narrowed from inside of her helm. *

" Surprise!!"

* She had to admit, she had quite a few new tricks up her sleeves!*
